name: WKDownload
desc: An object that represents the download of a web resource.

items.name: var delegate: WKDownloadDelegate?
items.desc: An object you use to track download progress and handle redirects, authentication challenges, and failures.

items.name: func cancel(((Data?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Cancels the download, and optionally captures data so that you can resume the download later.

items.name: var originalRequest: URLRequest?
items.desc: An object that represents the request that initiated the download.

items.name: var webView: WKWebView?
items.desc: The web view where the download initiated.

items.name: enum WKDownload.RedirectPolicy
items.desc: An enumeration with cases that indicate whether to proceed with a redirect.
